LanguageData.REGSITStool.label: 瑞格塞老虎凳
LanguageData.REGSITStool.description: 瑞格塞老虎凳 仅需一些皮革和钢材，就能得到天才般灵感创造而出的奢华感受和精致体验。 你还在等什么？ 致敬：the Galga Ler on Achron V.
LanguageData.REGSITStool_Blueprint.label: 瑞格塞老虎凳（蓝图）
LanguageData.REGSITStool_Blueprint_Install.label: 瑞格塞老虎凳（蓝图）
LanguageData.REGSITStool_Frame.label: 瑞格塞老虎凳（建造中）
LanguageData.REGSITStool_Frame.description: 瑞格塞老虎凳 仅需一些皮革和钢材，就能得到天才般灵感创造而出的奢华感受和精致体验。 你还在等什么？ 致敬：the Galga Ler on Achron V.
LanguageData.SITTSLABChair.label: 赛拉博椅
LanguageData.SITTSLABChair.description: 赛拉博椅 谁说石头不能做凳子？ 快来坐我，让我们一起狠狠的打那些人的脸！
LanguageData.SITTSLABChair_Blueprint.label: 赛拉博椅(blueprint)
LanguageData.SITTSLABChair_Blueprint_Install.label: 赛拉博椅(blueprint)
LanguageData.SITTSLABChair_Frame.label: 赛拉博椅(building)
LanguageData.SITTSLABChair_Frame.description: 赛拉博椅 谁说石头不能做凳子？ 快来坐我，让我们一起狠狠的打那些人的脸！
LanguageData.STAMMRESTChair.label: 斯坦瑞椅
LanguageData.STAMMRESTChair.description: 斯坦瑞椅 真实，无与伦比之椅 只有那些于废墟重生的红树之人才能乘坐
LanguageData.STAMMRESTChair_Blueprint.label: 斯坦瑞椅(blueprint)
LanguageData.STAMMRESTChair_Blueprint_Install.label: 斯坦瑞椅(blueprint)

LanguageData.PILREKLINCouch.label: 皮拉林长凳
LanguageData.PILREKLINCouch.description: 皮拉林长凳 皮革与纤维的交响乐，造就触感上的奢华感受
LanguageData.PILREKLINCouch_Blueprint.label: 皮拉林长凳(blueprint)
LanguageData.PILREKLINCouch_Blueprint_Install.label: 皮拉林长凳(blueprint)

LanguageData.BUTTEKUSHPillow.label: 布卡什枕头
LanguageData.BUTTEKUSHPillow.description: 布卡什枕头 劳碌之后，将你的大脑袋狠狠的砸在这个豪华的枕头上！

LanguageData.STAMMFLATTTable.label: 司马法拉桌
LanguageData.STAMMFLATTTable.description: 司马法拉桌 相传，是司马懿和法拉利在共同建造

LanguageData.SLABFLATTTable.label: 斯塔拉桌子
LanguageData.SLABFLATTTable.description: 斯塔拉桌子 豪华，完美！ 将引人注目的它摆到客厅中央，让您的宾客尖叫吧！

LanguageData.KRUDNEPPSingle.label: 库拿帕单人床
LanguageData.KRUDNEPPSingle.description: 库拿帕单人床 在库拿帕单人床上小憩。 它可能看起来有些摇晃，别担心，应该不会塌 （RIMkea承诺不担保任何使用者的人身安全 以及在使用我们的家具时遭受的所有伤害。 --RIMkea，法律部）

LanguageData.SLABNEPPDouble.label: 四拉皮双人床
LanguageData.SLABNEPPDouble.description: 四拉皮双人床 这张手工制作的石床，展现出错综复杂的 被称为“碎片结”的图案，和缠绕的双头蛇一样美丽。

LanguageData.SNORHOI.label: 斯诺和动物垫
LanguageData.SNORHOI.description:
斯诺和动物垫
"你的动物需要的不仅是你的关爱 还有柔软坚韧的斯诺和动物垫."
* - 周恩来**

LanguageData.BOLTASKLamp.label: BOLTASK Lamp
LanguageData.BOLTASKLamp.description:
BOLTASK Lamp
A bright and warm little fire, perfectly contained in a bowl.*
(*don't leave fire unattended.)

LanguageData.BOLTASKLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: BOLTASK Lamp (blueprint)

LanguageData.KAROMUF.label: KAROMUF sculpture
LanguageData.KAROMUF.description:
KAROMUF sculpture
The holy KAROMUFF is a creature worshiped by the Cheda of the Indigo Gerbil Tribe on Alioth Posterius.
LanguageData.KAROMUF_Blueprint_Install.label: KAROMUF sculpture (blueprint)
LanguageData.SMOERTIGE.label: SMOERTIGE sculpture
LanguageData.SMOERTIGE.description:
SMOERTIGE sculpture
This stunning statue is a likeness of "Anha the Graceful" a matriarch of the Gray People Tribe known to be a dazzling and exquisite beauty.
LanguageData.SMOERTIGE_Blueprint_Install.label: SMOERTIGE sculpture (blueprint)
LanguageData.LORDOKI.label: LORDOKI sculpture
LanguageData.LORDOKI.description:
LORDOKI sculpture
This statue depicts the wolf-like god named "LORDOKI", worshiped by the Purple Lobster Crouca on Aldhafera XI
LanguageData.LORDOKI_Blueprint_Install.label: LORDOKI sculpture (blueprint)
LanguageData.BLUMTASK.label: BLUMTASK plant pot
LanguageData.BLUMTASK.description:
BLUMTASK plant pot
Designed by the honorable Shinzhor of Shinzaram, this lovely horn offers a charming alternative to plant your flowers in.
LanguageData.BLUMTASK_Blueprint.label: BLUMTASK plant pot (blueprint)
LanguageData.BLUMTASK_Blueprint_Install.label: BLUMTASK plant pot (blueprint)

LanguageData.BLUMTASK_Frame.description:
BLUMTASK plant pot
Designed by the honorable Shinzhor of Shinzaram, this lovely horn offers a charming alternative to plant your flowers in.
LanguageData.aFLIKFUTRug.label: FLIKFUT Rug
LanguageData.aFLIKFUTRug.description:
FLIKFUT Rug
Five pieces of leather, fit together into a beautifully savage-looking rug to decorate your home with!

FLIKFUT Rug
Five pieces of leather, fit together into a beautifully savage-looking rug to decorate your home with!
LanguageData.MATIPESSIRug.label: MATIPESSI Rug
LanguageData.MATIPESSIRug.description:
MATIPESSI Rug
A charming little rug in the style of the Abeneiro of Llama Tribe.

LanguageData.MISKANTAARug.label: MISKANTAA Rug
LanguageData.MISKANTAARug.description:
MISKANTAA Rug
This piece of art, in the form of a rug, shows a marvelous design used by the Caxigo Braga people on Achrid I.

LanguageData.HOISTEPRug.label: HOISTEP Rug
LanguageData.HOISTEPRug.description:
HOISTEP Rug
Give your home that "barnyard feel" with this artfully arranged collection of hay.
